name: Dodge The Knives!
description:
This is not a finished product!!!!!

This is a basic game that I made in two days.

These are the controls:

  • Use the A & D keys to move left and right
  • Try to dodge as many knives as you can

If you would like me to add more things please leave a comment and I will be sure to read them as this would help me a lot.

Thanks for trying out my game
